## authorize.allowAllExcept variable

Allow all but the given roles

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
allowAllExcept: (...roles: string[]) => (target: any, method?: string | undefined, methodDescriptor?: TypedPropertyDescriptor<any> | undefined) => any
```
